document.full_text: the movie can open but the judge said that the designer of mike tyson's face tattoo, who is suing warner brothers entertainment for copyright infringement, had an excellent chance for success.
document.title: judge rules for 'hangover ii' in tyson tattoo case
lines_and_colors: the movie can open but the judge said that the designer of mike tyson's face tattoo, who is suing warner brothers entertainment for copyright infringement, had an excellent chance for success.
